Description: On I-81 at mile marker 142.8 in the County of Roanoke, motorists can expect delays due to a multi-vehicle crash. The south left shoulder, left lane, center lane, and right shoulder are closed. Traffic backups are approximately 1.0 mile.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Multi-Vehicle Crash

Description: On VA-145 East in the County of Chesterfield, in the vicinity of Centralia Rd; Chester Rd; Rt. 717E/W (Chesterfield County); VA-144N/S; VA-145W, motorists can expect delays due to standing water.
Label: Weather Incident - Standing Water - Advisory

Description: On I-66 at mile marker 57 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The east right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On I-64 at mile marker 278 in the City of Norfolk, near Tidewater Drive, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The west right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 165.4 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The south right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle
